item.title: To log, or not to log, that is the question.
item.description: An alternative logging strategy to make loggers your friends, not enemies

item.title: About
item.description: Personal blog of Stanley Nguyen. This is a space for my random thoughts, opinions, and projects. If you are already here, hope you find something interesting! Hit me up over on Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, or even LinkedIn!

item.title: My Impossible™ kebab and the economics of green products
item.description: A thought and food experiment from a neutral environmentalist

item.description: A Golang module to check if a number or a string is thirteen

item.title: Building my Github Action to deliver doggoes to PRs
item.description: Because who doesn’t want good boys to show up whenever they push?

item.title: Quick terminal-based DNS switching
item.description: A quick guide to switching DNS servers settings to tackle nameserver blocking & corporate proxy
